price: پرته له هغو كسانو چې صبر يې كړى او ښه كارونه يې كړي، د هغوى لپاره بخښنه او لوى اجر دى.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ṣabarū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
